title: The Writer's Almanac - Friday, February 19, 2021
description: “A poem is a window that hangs between two or more human beings who otherwise live in darkened rooms.” -- Stephen Dobyns, who celebrates his 80th birthday today.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: “A poem is a window that hangs between two or more human beings who otherwise live in darkened rooms.” -- Stephen Dobyns, who celebrates his 80th birthday today.
